SELECT QI.PROC_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR039',QI.PROC_STAT_CD) AS PROC_STAT_CD_NM , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR041',QI.QUEST_TYP_CD) AS QUEST_TYP_CD_NM , QI.QUEST_NO , QI.QUEST_CONT , MB.LOGIN_ID , TO_CHAR(QI.QUEST_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS QUEST_DTM , QI.GOODS_NO , GB.GOODS_NM , BM.BRAND_NM , EB.ENTR_NM , QI.QUEST_DISP_PROCMN_ID , TO_CHAR(QI.QUEST_DISP_PROC_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS QUEST_DISP_PROC_DTM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PR_GOODS_QA_ANS_INFO AI WHERE AI.QUEST_NO = QI.QUEST_NO) AS QA_ANS_CNT , QI.QUEST_DISP_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR022',QI.QUEST_DISP_STAT_CD) AS QUEST_DISP_STAT_CD_NM , (SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG WHERE STD_CTG_NO = SC.STD_LRG_CTG_NO ) || COALESCE( (SELECT '>' || STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG WHERE STD_CTG_NO = SC.STD_MID_CTG_NO) , '') || COALESCE( (SELECT '>' || STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG WHERE STD_CTG_NO = SC.STD_SML_CTG_NO) , '') || COALESCE( (SELECT '>' || STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG WHERE STD_CTG_NO = SC.STD_THN_CTG_NO) , '') AS STD_CTG_HIERARCHY , SC.MD_ID , QI.MVOT_YN , QI.SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(QI.SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , QI.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(QI.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_GOODS_QA_QUEST_INFO QI , ET_MBR_BASE MB , PR_GOODS_BASE GB LEFT OUTER JOIN PR_BRAND_MST BM ON (GB.BRAND_NO = BM.BRAND_NO) , ET_ENTR_BASE EB , PR_STD_CTG SC WHERE 1 = 1 AND QI.DEL_YN = 'N' AND MB.MBR_NO = QI.MBR_NO AND GB.GOODS_NO = QI.GOODS_NO AND GB.ENTR_NO = EB.ENTR_NO AND GB.STD_CTG_NO = SC.STD_CTG_NO AND QI.QUEST_DTM >= TO_TIMESTAMP( #{questStartDtm} || ' 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND QI.QUEST_DTM <= TO_TIMESTAMP( #{questEndDtm} || ' 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND QI.QUEST_TYP_CD LIKE #{questTypCd} || '%' AND GB.ENTR_NO LIKE #{entrNo} || '%' AND GB.BUY_TYP_CD LIKE #{buyTypCd} || '%' AND QI.PROC_STAT_CD LIKE #{procStatCd} || '%' AND QI.QUEST_DISP_STAT_CD LIKE #{questDispStatCd} || '%' AND GB.STD_CTG_NO LIKE #{stdCtgNo} || '%' AND SC.MD_ID LIKE #{mdId} || '%'
AND
GB.GOODS_NO LIKE #{goodsNo} || '%'
ORDER BY QI.QUEST_DTM DESC
mapper.select: SELECT QI.GOODS_NO /* prGoodsQaQuestInfo.getGoodsQAQuestInfo */ , QI.QUEST_NO , QI.PROC_STAT_CD , TO_CHAR(QI.PROC_STAT_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS PROC_STAT_DTM , QI.PROC_ID , GB.GOODS_NM , CI.CONT_FILE_PATH_NM , CI.CONT_FILE_NM , EB.ENTR_NM , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR006',GB.BUY_TYP_CD) AS BUY_TYP_CD_NM , MB.LOGIN_ID , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR041',QI.QUEST_TYP_CD) AS QUEST_TYP_CD_NM , QI.QUEST_CONT , TO_CHAR(QI.QUEST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS QUEST_DTM , QI.QUEST_DISP_STAT_CD , QI.QUEST_DISP_PROCMN_ID , TO_CHAR(QI.QUEST_DISP_PROC_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS QUEST_DISP_PROC_DTM , QI.MVOT_YN , QI.MVOT_CAUS , QI.SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(QI.SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , QI.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(QI.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_GOODS_QA_QUEST_INFO QI , ET_MBR_BASE MB , PR_GOODS_BASE GB , PR_GOODS_CONT_INFO CI , ET_ENTR_BASE EB WHERE 1 = 1 AND MB.MBR_NO = QI.MBR_NO AND GB.GOODS_NO = QI.GOODS_NO AND GB.GOODS_NO = CI.GOODS_NO AND CI.CMT_TYP_CD = '03' /* 컨텐츠유형코드(PR017) */ AND CI.IMG_GB_CD = '10' /* 이미지구분코드(PR031) */ AND GB.ENTR_NO = EB.ENTR_NO AND QUEST_NO = #{questNo}
